title: Cody Greene and the Rainbow Mystery
description: When a painting is stolen from nine year old Cody Greene's family's art gallery, he does what any artist does best: he sketches the clues. Through cooking with his friend, visiting the midwife with his mom, hiking with his dad, and helping to prepare for an upcoming art and craft festival, Cody's homeschooling takes a new turn as he unravels the Case of the Rainbow Mystery.
author: Linda Fields
